projects.title: Employee Onboarding Platform
projects.description: An employee onboarding platform streamlines the process of integrating new hires into a company. This platform can handle document submissions, training schedules, and essential introductions in a structured manner.

projects.title: Invoice Processing App
projects.description: This application focuses on transforming traditional paper-based processes into digital formats, suitable for small to medium-sized enterprises. A common application could be for invoice processing, where the app can handle the creation, approval, and payment processes digitally

projects.title: ChatGPT Chatbot
projects.description: ChatGPT, developed by OpenAI, is designed to generate human-like text based on the input it receives, making it a strong candidate for customer support applications where conversational abilities are crucial.
